Privacy policy Purpose of the processing (purpose and legal basis)

The company PLEFEBVRE JOAILLIER, whose head office is located in Marseille (13004) at 21 Boulevard de Roux, has an online sales website. This site allows me to receive orders from customers and the data collected on this occasion are recorded and processed in a dedicated file.

This file only allows to manage the orders, the payment and the delivery.

None of the data will ever be used for commercial marketing campaigns or advertising purposes, nor will it be passed on to a commercial partner for this purpose.

Legal basis for processing

Order management: the legal basis for processing is the execution of a contract (see Article 6.1.b) of the European Data Protection Regulation).

Bookkeeping involving the retention of data for a period of 10 years: the legal basis for processing is the legal obligation (see Article 6.1.c of the European Data Protection Regulation).

Categories of data

Identity: surname, first name, address, delivery address, telephone number, e-mail address, internal processing code allowing the identification of the customer.

Order data: transaction number, purchase details, purchase amount, invoice payment data (payments, outstanding payments, discounts), product returns.

Data relating to payment methods are not recorded and are processed directly by the online payment service.

IP address of the device used to visit the site.

Recipients of the data

The company PLEFEBVRE JOAILLIER is the recipient of all categories of data.

Its subcontractors, responsible for the delivery of its orders, are recipients of the identity, address and telephone number of the recipient.

Duration of data retention

Data necessary for the management of orders and invoicing: for the entire duration of the commercial relationship and ten (10) years for accounting purposes.

Data relating to means of payment: this data is not kept by PLEFEBVRE JOAILLIER. it is collected at the time of the transaction and is immediately deleted once the purchase has been paid for.

Your rights

You can access, rectify or delete your personal data. You also have the right to portability and the right to limit the processing of your data (see the cnil.fr website for more information on your rights).

To exercise these rights or for any question about the processing of your data in this system, you can contact me directly.

By e-mail: contact@plefebvrebjo.com

By post :

Joaillerie P.Lefebvre

21, Boulevard de Roux

13004 Marseille

If, after having contacted the company PLEFEBVRE JOAILLIER, you feel that your "Data Protection" rights have not been respected, you can send a complaint online to the CNIL.
